diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Vaccination response to VSVÎ”G-ZEBOV without evidence of Ebolavirus infection
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient exhibited transient positive real-time PCR results for vesicular stomatitis virus nucleoprotein and Ebola virus glycoprotein following vaccination, but consistently negative results for Ebola virus nucleoprotein, indicating a vaccination response rather than an infection. Symptoms such as fever, malaise, and chills developed post-vaccination and were self-limited.
